ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_Tinkering] gear and spocket
ygData.msgSnippet: The sprockets it refers to are simply called sprockets and are readily avaliable from the vendors both at the mills and in overthere Gentral Kalpariah
ygData.messageBody:
The sprockets it refers to are simply called "sprockets" and are readily
avaliable from the vendors both at the mills and in overthere

Gentral Kalpariah tinkering Necrophile...errr, mancer of Brell
----- Original Message -----
From: Marjorie McKeon <marji@...>
To: <EQ_Tinkering@egroups.com>
Sent: Wednesday, November 15, 2000 11:08 AM
Subject: Re: [EQ_Tinkering] gear and spocket


> In all of my tinkering I have never used any of these, instead I go to the
> third windmill in Steamfont and buy what I need from the vender there.
The
> ones that he sells are not sized.
>
> Sahpra
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: "Rasanka " <vumdar@...>
> To: <EQ_Tinkering@egroups.com>

> Subject: [EQ_Tinkering] gear and spocket
>
